title: Font representing momentum?
content:
I'm doing a brochure for a company working to revitalize themselves. They are going with a theme of "regaining the momentum."

Anyone have a good heading font that would well portray momentum? Action? Moving forward? Strength? I'm using an image of bicycle racers, obviously in full motion.
author: dl

comments.content: I did not see anyone use Eras for a while ... regaining momentum?

Probably not what you are looking for... but I like it. Strength & Forward Momentum.

[Slag and Earth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020233433/http:/www.thefontry.com/race1b/racepak1ballthefonts.jpg)

I use Slag in the non-chiseled version mostly. That is a very biast opinion though.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020233433/http:/www.thefontry.com/)

Thanks guys. Good suggestions. But I eventually went with Planet Kosmos. Plus, it was free. Can't be that.

[http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=planet\_kosmos&page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&t...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020233433/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=planet_kosmos&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=momentum&nb_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=alpha "http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=planet\_kosmos&page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&text=momentum&nb\_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=alpha")
